resources.string: WELCOME TO CHOOSU, WHERE DECISIONS ARE NOT MADE BY YOU.
To use this App, first install Yelp and go to the restaurant of your choice and find the share button as circled.
Then the share menu opens up, locate and click on the App Icon as circled in the picture.
Kindly press backward if you wish to add more restaurants. Smash the circled button 5 times quickly to randomly choose a restaurant.
After Smashing, the restaurant of apps choice opens. Happy Eating!!!
